description.narrative: 1. More robust network that was able to fulfill its role and tasks effectively in 2017 and prepared to carry on and scale up its work in 2018 and beyond 2. Successful coordinated mobilizations and media/communications work during key moments on the following issues and opportunities • Calls for stopping / reducing financing of coal and fossil fuels; Calls for divestment from coal and fossil fuels – key moments include: ADB 50th Year and Global Week of Action for Divestment; October IMF and World Bank Annual Meetings; key dates targeting Philippine investors and financiers of coal • Calls for stopping specific coal projects (coal power plants and coal mines) including moratorium / suspension of ECCs • Reclaim Power Week of Action – October 2017 3. Highlighting of Piglas Pilipinas and Philippine climate movement's call for energy transformation and shift away from fossil fuels at international political events ex.UNFCCC

1. Pool together and facilitate exchange of information, knowledge and analysis that will enrich and inform strategies and tactics, educational resources, media and communications efforts 2. Facilitate joint mobilizations, policy engagements and media work to scale up momentum and political pressure on government and other relevant institutions, especially during key political moments 3. Deepen and widen the involvement of leaders and communities within the Catholic, Protestants and other faith institutions and traditions 4. Raise public awareness and attention on the harmful impacts of fossil fuel and the urgency of ending fossil fuel energy as soon as possible, and shape public opinion towards supporting the calls and demands of the campaign 5. Generate regular and wide media coverage of the calls, demands and actions against coal energy and fossil fuels 6. Show the broad range of civil society actors supporting the above calls and encourage, inspire and provide vehicles for broad participation and involvement of various constituencies and institutions in anti-fossil fuel campaigns
